:v-model.description: A boolean variable is bound via v-model, which is bound bidirectionally
:v-model.description_zh: 通过v-model绑定一个布尔值变量，这个变量是双向绑定的

inactive-color.description: The background color when turned off

vibrate-short.description: Whether it causes the phone to vibrate for a short time is currently only effective in the WeChat Mini Program and WeChat Mini Program Development Tools of iOS
vibrate-short.description_zh: 是否使手机发生短促震动，目前只在iOS的微信小程序和微信小程序开发工具有效

active-value.description: The value emitted via the change event when the selector is opened
active-value.description_zh: 打开选择器时通过change事件发出的值

inactive-value.description: The value emitted via the change event when the selector is closed
inactive-value.description_zh: 关闭选择器时通过change事件发出的值

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers when the switch is turned on or off
